telemetry.desc: By opting to send telemetry data, you can help us improve the overall user experience of {{appName}}.
telemetry.title: Send Anonymous Usage Data

clear.confirm: Confirm to clear all chat data?
clear.desc: This will clear all session data, including assistant, files, messages, plugins, etc.
clear.success: All session messages have been cleared
clear.title: Clear All Session Messages

reset.desc: Reset all settings to default values
reset.title: Reset All Settings

hotkey.invalidCombination: The hotkey must include at least one modifier key (Ctrl, Alt, Shift) and one regular key
hotkey.record: Press a key to record the hotkey
hotkey.title: Hotkeys

llm.aesGcm: Your keys and proxy address will be encrypted using the <1>AES-GCM</1> encryption algorithm

checker.desc: Test if the API Key and proxy address are filled in correctly
checker.title: Connectivity Check

customModelCards.confirmDelete: You are about to delete this custom model. Once deleted, it cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.

azureDeployName.extra: The field actually requested in Azure OpenAI
azureDeployName.placeholder: Enter the model deployment name in Azure
azureDeployName.title: Model Deployment Name

displayName.placeholder: Enter the display name of the model, such as ChatGPT, GPT-4, etc.
displayName.title: Model Display Name

files.extra: The current file upload implementation is merely a hack solution and is intended for personal experimentation only. Please wait for a complete file upload capability in future updates.
files.title: Support File Upload

functionCall.extra: This configuration will only enable function calling capabilities within the application. Whether function calling is supported depends entirely on the model itself; please test the model's function calling capabilities on your own.
functionCall.title: Support Function Call

id.extra: Will be displayed as the model label
id.placeholder: Enter the model ID, such as gpt-4-turbo-preview or claude-2.1
id.title: Model ID

vision.extra: This configuration will only enable image upload capabilities within the application. Whether recognition is supported depends entirely on the model itself; please test the model's visual recognition capabilities on your own.
vision.title: Support Visual Recognition

fetchOnClient.desc: Client-side fetching mode initiates session requests directly from the browser, improving response speed.
fetchOnClient.title: Use Client-Side Fetching Mode

modelList.desc: Select the models to display in the session. The selected models will be displayed in the model list.
modelList.placeholder: Please select a model from the list
modelList.title: Model List

proxyUrl.desc: Must include http(s):// in addition to the default address
proxyUrl.title: API Proxy Address

llm.waitingForMore: More models are <1>planned to be added</1>, stay tuned

plugin.empty: No installed plugins yet, feel free to explore the <1>Plugin Store</1>

settings.hint: Please fill in the following configurations based on the description
settings.title: {{id}} Plugin Configuration

description.desc: A brief introduction to your assistant, not for character setting
description.title: Assistant Description

tag.desc: Assistant tags will be displayed in the assistant marketplace
tag.title: Tag

neutralColor.desc: Custom grayscale with different color tendencies
neutralColor.title: Neutral Color

autoCreateTopicThreshold.desc: Automatically create a topic when the current message count exceeds this value
autoCreateTopicThreshold.title: Message Threshold

compressThreshold.desc: When the uncompressed history messages exceed this value, compression will be applied
compressThreshold.title: History Message Length Compression Threshold

enableAutoCreateTopic.desc: Whether to automatically create a topic during the conversation, only effective in temporary topics
enableAutoCreateTopic.title: Auto Create Topic

enableCompressHistory.title: Enable Automatic Summary of Chat History

historyCount.desc: Number of historical messages carried with each request
historyCount.title: Attached History Message Count

inputTemplate.desc: The user's latest message will be filled into this template
inputTemplate.placeholder: Preprocessing template {{text}} will be replaced with real-time input information
inputTemplate.title: User Input Preprocessing

none.desc: This depends on the model's response output method; please test it yourself.

frequencyPenalty.desc: The higher the value, the more diverse and rich the vocabulary; the lower the value, the simpler and more straightforward the language.
frequencyPenalty.title: Vocabulary Richness

maxTokens.desc: The maximum number of tokens used for each interaction
maxTokens.title: Max Tokens Limit

presencePenalty.desc: The higher the value, the more inclined to use different expressions and avoid concept repetition; the lower the value, the more inclined to use repeated concepts or narratives, resulting in more consistent expression.
presencePenalty.title: Expression Divergence

reasoningEffort.desc: Higher values enhance reasoning ability but may increase response time and token usage.
reasoningEffort.title: Reasoning Effort

temperature.desc: The higher the value, the more creative and imaginative the responses; the lower the value, the more rigorous the responses.
temperature.title: Creativity Level
temperature.warning: If the creativity level is set too high, the output may become garbled.

topP.desc: How many possibilities to consider; a higher value accepts more potential answers, while a lower value tends to choose the most likely answer. It is not recommended to change this alongside the creativity level.
topP.title: Openness to Ideas

openingMessage.desc: The opening message displayed when the conversation starts, used to introduce the assistant's features
openingMessage.placeholder: Hello, I am your Custom Assistant. You can start chatting with me right away, or go to Assistant Settings to complete my information.
openingMessage.title: Opening Message

openingQuestions.desc: Guiding questions displayed at the beginning of the conversation
openingQuestions.title: Opening Questions

accessCode.desc: Encryption access is enabled by the administrator
accessCode.title: Access Password

signin.desc: Sign in using SSO to unlock the app
signin.title: Sign In to Your Account

showAllLocaleVoice.desc: If closed, only voices in the current language will be displayed
showAllLocaleVoice.title: Show All Locale Voices

sttAutoStop.desc: When closed, speech recognition will not end automatically and requires manual click to stop
sttAutoStop.title: Auto Stop Speech Recognition

sttLocale.desc: The language of the speech input, this option can improve the accuracy of speech recognition
sttLocale.title: Speech Recognition Language

sttService.desc: Where 'browser' is the native speech recognition service of the browser
sttService.title: Speech Recognition Service

ttsService.desc: If using OpenAI text-to-speech service, make sure the OpenAI model service is enabled
ttsService.title: Text-to-Speech Service

voice.desc: Select a voice for the current assistant, different TTS services support different voices
voice.title: Text-to-Speech Voice

exportType.all: Export Global Settings and All Assistant Data

storage.desc: Current storage usage in the browser
storage.title: Data Storage

submitAgentModal.metaMiss: Please complete the assistant information before submitting. It should include name, description, and tags
submitAgentModal.placeholder: Enter a unique identifier for the assistant, e.g. web-development

deviceName.hint: Add a name for easy identification
deviceName.title: Device Name

warning.tip: After a long period of community testing, WebRTC synchronization may not reliably meet general data synchronization needs. Please <1>deploy a signaling server</1> before use.

channelName.desc: WebRTC will use this name to create a sync channel. Ensure the channel name is unique.
channelName.title: Sync Channel Name

channelPassword.desc: Add a password to ensure channel privacy. Only devices with the correct password can join the channel.
channelPassword.title: Sync Channel Password

webrtc.desc: Real-time, peer-to-peer data communication requires all devices to be online for synchronization.

enabled.invalid: Please fill in the signaling server and synchronization channel name before enabling.
enabled.title: Enable Sync

signaling.desc: WebRTC will use this address for synchronization
signaling.title: Signaling Server

webrtc.title: WebRTC Sync

agentMeta.label: Assistant Metadata Generation Model
agentMeta.modelDesc: Model designated for generating assistant name, description, avatar, and tags
agentMeta.title: Automatically Generate Assistant Information

customPrompt.desc: Once filled out, the system assistant will use the custom prompt when generating content
customPrompt.title: Custom Prompt

generationTopic.label: AI Art Topic Naming Model
generationTopic.modelDesc: Model designated for automatic naming of AI art topics
generationTopic.title: AI Art Automatic Topic Naming

systemAgent.helpInfo: When creating a new assistant, the default assistant settings will be used as preset values.

historyCompress.label: Conversation History Model
historyCompress.modelDesc: Specify the model used to compress conversation history
historyCompress.title: Automatically Summarize Conversation History

queryRewrite.label: Question Rewriting Model
queryRewrite.modelDesc: Specify the model used to optimize user inquiries
queryRewrite.title: Knowledge Base Question Rewrite

thread.label: Subtopic Naming Model
thread.modelDesc: The model designated for automatic renaming of subtopics
thread.title: Automatic Subtopic Naming

systemAgent.title: System Assistants

topic.label: Topic Naming Model
topic.modelDesc: Model designated for automatic topic renaming
topic.title: Automatic Topic Naming

tools.disabled: The current model does not support function calls and cannot use the plugin
tools.title: Extension Tools
